name: Sustainability Starter Kit
details: This starter kit is all you need to start the revolution. Consists of:
items: 1 Plant Based Reusable Cup with 2 lids
features: Govt Approved, Tested, and approved in TUV Rhineland, Germany
Odorless tasteless and doesn’t react with hot beverages

name: Plant Based Reusable Cups
details: Barista's love it! Easy to clean, hassle free and Plant Based. Sourced from local farmers, plant residue from Bamboo, Wheat, Rice, and Barley is processed and molded into reusable cups which can be used hundreds of times. So, every batch is unique, Just. Like. You.
features: Every batch of cups is unique due to being natural.
Govt Approved, Tested, and approved in TUV, Germany
Odorless tasteless and doesn’t react with hot beverages
careGuide: Place the cup and the lid separately on top shelf of the dishwasher.

name: Reusable Bamboo Straws
details: We collaborated with artisans in Veitnam, Earthly Organic Bamboo Straws are 100% Compostable, Vegan and BPA free. They can be reused, thrown in a compost bin, or even in your backyard. Serve with cold beverages like ice tea, cold coffee and many more.
careGuide: Wash it with clean water under the tap.
Boil in water for a few minutes.

name: Natural Bamboo Loofah
details: Natural loofah sponges actually come from the fruits of vine-growing Luffa plants. These plants are part of the gourd family (Cucurbitaceae) making them relatives of watermelons, cucumbers and pumpkins. When a luffa fruit dries out and is peeled, you are left with its fibrous interior, which can be used as a sponge. It is biodegradable and is an organic, eco-friendly exfoliating body scrubber. Both men and women can use it, suitable for shower and bathtub.
features: Plant-based material; Better for the skin - No Chemicals
Exfoliation - Removing dead skin cells not only improves the look of your skin, it also sweeps away places where bacteria and soil could collect.
Improving Circulation - Unlike harshly abrasive scrubbers and sponges, a loofah's firm but elastic fibers are round in cross section and are less likely to scratch skin
howToUse: Wet the loofah or soak it in water
Gently rub the loofah against your skin in circular motions.

name: Bamboo Toothbrush (set of 2)
details: Earthly Bamboo Toothbrush are BPA free, Biodegradable and have charcoal infused bristles that help remove stains effectively. We guarantee your satisfaction. See for yourself!
careGuide: Wash your best eco-friendly toothbrushes with water to avoid any kind of bacteria growth.
Make sure there is no ingredient left on bristles.
Keep it in a dry and safe place.

name: Plant Based Reusable Containers
details: Sourced from local farmers, plant residue from Bamboo, Wheat, Rice, and Barley is processed and molded into reusable containers which can be used hundreds of times. Microwave safe, seal proof, and sturdy, they are perfect to store snacks or lunch. Designed in USA. Tested in Germany.
features: Govt Approved, Tested and approved in TUV Rhineland Germany.
Odorless tasteless and doesn’t react with hot food
careGuide: Can be reused hundreds of times. Just wash under a tap or in a dishwasher.
